bodyStyle.description: Css style to applied to modal body.

closable.description: Whether a close (x) button is visible on top right of the modal dialog or not.

title.description: The modal dialog's title - supports html.

maskStyle.description: Css style to applied to modal mask.

maskClosable.description: Whether to close the modal dialog when the mask (area outside the modal) is clicked.

okButtonProps.description: Set additional properties for the ok button.

style.description: Css style to applied to modal.

cancelButtonProps.description: Set additional properties for the cancel button.

wrapperStyle.description: Css style to applied to modal wrapper.

zIndex.description: The z-index of the modal. Useful when displaying two modals simultaneously.

onOk.description: Trigger actions when Ok button is clicked.

onOpen.description: Trigger actions when modal is opened.

onCancel.description: Trigger actions when Cancel button is clicked.

onClose.description: Trigger actions after onOk or onCancel is completed.
